description: These vegan gingerbread doughnuts are perfect for Halloween, or whatever you've got to celebrate this fall. Lightly spiced, sweetened with molasses and bathed in a sweet-tart apple cider glaze, it's scary how good they are!
name: Vegan Gingerbread Doughnuts with Apple Cider Glaze
recipeIngredient: 1 cup unflavored soy or almond milk
1/3 cup canola oil, (or your favorite baking oil)
1 1/2 tbsp. apple cider, (could sub apple juice or water)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350Â°. Lightly oil 9 doughnut cavities of a doughnut pan (or a couple of doughnut pans).
In medium bowl, whisk together milk, oil, molasses, maple syrup and flaxseeds. Set aside.
In large mixing bowl, stir together flour, baking powder, spices and salt. Add wet mixture and stir just until blended.
Divide mixture into doughnut cavities. Bake 12 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool.
